column2: The message of the cross is foolishness to those who are perishing.
The foolishness of God is wiser than human wisdom.
Christ Jesus is our wisdom, righteousness, sanctification, and redemption.
Eye has not seen, nor ear heard, nor entered into the heart of man the things which God has prepared for those who love Him.
Your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit.
Faithful stewards of the mysteries of God.
Your body is the temple of the Holy Spirit who is in you.
The fashion of this world is passing away.
Run in such a way that you may obtain the prize.
God is faithful; He will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear.
Imitate me as I imitate Christ.
You are the body of Christ, and individually members of it.
And now abide faith, hope, love, these three; but the greatest of these is love.
God is not the author of confusion but of peace.
Christ died for our sins according to the Scriptures.
Thanks be to God, who gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
Let all that you do be done with love.
He will keep you strong to the end.
We have received the Spirit of God.
We are God's fellow workers.
The kingdom of God is not in word but in power.
Christ, our Passover lamb, was sacrificed for us.
Glorify God in your body and in your spirit, which are God's.
Let each man have his own wife, and let each woman have her own husband.
There is one God, the Father, from whom all things came and for whom we live.
Woe to me if I do not preach the gospel!
The Lord Jesus, on the night He was betrayed, took bread.
There are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
Love is patient, love is kind.
Pursue love, and desire spiritual gifts.
Always abound in the work of the Lord.
